_xResult.title: Unicorn Stripe Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made silk dress with luminous bodice stripe
_xResult.longdesc:
This luxurious piece in Samshek's high-style Unicorn line is made of the softest microfiber silk and the embroidery work is carefully done by hand to be stylish and durable. The shine of the fabric and effervescence of the sequins evokes a feeling of fantasy and wonder, as the asymmetrically-placed sequin stripe gives the structured dress a bit of rebellion. Know that you are owning your femininity in this dream of a bespoke dress.

 

The pictured dress is a sleeveless, jewel neckline cut to above the knees.  You can customize your neckline, sleeve length, and length of the dress below. During checkout, you may also specify exactly how many inches or centimeters long you'd like your dress to be!
